Hometown

There are several implementations of libsass for a variety of languages. Here are just a few of them. Note, some implementations may or may not be up to date. We have not verified whether they work.

C

  • sassc

Go

  • go-libsass
  • go_sass
  • go-sass

Lua

  • lua-sass

.NET

  • libsass-net
  • NSass
  • Sass.Net

node.js

  • node-sass

Java

  • libsass-maven-plugin
  • jsass

JavaScript

  • sass.js

Perl

  • CSS::Sass
  • Text::Sass::XS

PHP

  • sassphp

Python

  • libsass-python
  • SassPython
  • pylibsass
  • python-scss

Ruby

  • sassruby

Scala

  • Sass-Scala

Tcl

  • tclsass
